## AppWebsocket class

A class to establish a websocket connection to an App interface of a Holochain conductor.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class AppWebsocket extends Emittery implements AppApi 
```
**Extends:** Emittery

**Implements:** [AppApi](./client.appapi.md)
